html.p: Welcome to the Arc Reactor developed by 95 Cyber Protection Team.
This app was developed to to aid investigations to the operator by aggregating data sources organically employed with in the Marine Corps's Deployable Mission Support Suite (DMSS).

b.i: Select additional content to view using the checkboxes below:

html.p: There are a number of Splunk apps and TAs loaded on this system in order to support this hands-on experience. Here are the key ones we will use today :

ul.li: Splunk Add-on For Microsoft Windows to provide extractions for Windows event logs.
Add-on for Microsoft Sysmon to provide extractions for Sysmon output.
Palo Alto Networks Add-on for Splunk to provide extractions for Palo Alto output.
Splunk Stream to provide extractions for Splunk Stream output.
Splunk TA for Suricata to provide extractions for Suricata output.

html.p: Thank you to the authors of each app which makes our collective lives easier each day!
